VENTURE CAPITAL

First Standard Title Limited (FSTL) is a globally structured financial infrastructure venture. Nigeria serves strictly as the pilot and proof-of-execution market. This disclosure is prepared for qualified stockbrokers, venture capital firms, and institutional partners.

Capitalisation Objective (12-Month Horizon)

  • Full operational capitalisation within 12 months
  • Valuation benchmarked against Nigerian non-life insurance market capitalisation
  • Transition from pilot deployment to multi-jurisdiction expansion

Market Benchmark

Nigeria’s non-life insurance sector provides a validated public-market reference for FSTL’s asset protection, risk transfer, and capital certainty model. FSTL is positioned to exceed traditional insurers through technology-driven title intelligence and structured risk certainty.

Use of Venture Capital

  • Platform hardening and enterprise security
  • Regulatory, legal, and compliance expansion
  • Global market entry preparation
  • Strategic institutional partnerships

Embedded Venture Capital Memorandum

The full Venture Capital Memorandum is embedded below for review.

Investor FAQ

Is FSTL a Nigeria-only venture?

No. Nigeria is the pilot market. FSTL is designed as a global financial infrastructure platform.

Is this capital raise driven by distress?

No. This is a structured venture expansion aligned with market benchmarks and execution milestones.

What differentiates FSTL?

FSTL converts land and property certainty into bankable, insurable, and tradable capital through technology, legal intelligence, and structured risk frameworks.

Who should engage?

Institutional investors, venture funds, stockbrokers, and strategic financial partners seeking exposure to next-generation asset infrastructure.
